short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows new comments posted on reddit and Hacker News since you last visited a comment thread.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension remembers last time you visited comment threads on reddit and Hacker News and highlights the comments that were posted since your last visit. If you turn on Chrome sync, this setting will be shared across all your browsers so you can keep track of discussions even on multiple computers.
